title.rendered: Tianjin Airlines Customer care number | Address

content.rendered:
Tianjin Airlines ( Grand China Express Air) airline was established in 2004. It is a regional airline headquartered in Tianjin Binhai International Airport passenger terminal building, Dongli District, Tianjin, People’s Republic of China, operating domestic scheduled passenger and cargo flights out of Tianjin Binhai International Airport.

 

Tianjin Airlines Address:
 1196 Airport Road, Dongli District, Tianjin

 Phone: Service advice and suggestions 24-hour hotline: 95350 (outside mainland China: +86-10-95350)

Online ticket service hotline: 95350 to 3

Email:

Working hours

Tianjin Airlines Official website: http://www.tianjin-air.com/

Tianjin Airlines official website Weibo: http://weibo.com/gsair

Tianjin Airlines Online Check-in: http://www.tianjin-air.com/selfservice/checkinQuery.html

Check Tianjin Airlines schedule here: http://www.tianjin-air.com/selfservice/irregularFlightChange.html

Check Tianjin Airlines flight status here: http://www.tianjin-air.com/selfservice/flightstatus.html

Tianjin Airlines Baggage Allowance

Tianjin Airlines Baggage

View Tianjin Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, charges in the above link.

Travel with pets in Tianjin Airlines

Please visit http://www.tianjin-air.com/travelhelp/index.html?list=luggageTransport4

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Tianjin Airlines

Total fleet: 87

Airbus A320

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A320neo

Airbus A330

  • Airbus A330-200

Dornier Do-328

  • Dornier Do-328JET

Embraer ERJ-145

  • Embraer ERJ-145

Embraer ERJ-190

  • Embraer ERJ-190
  • Embraer ERJ-195

Queries handled by Tianjin Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Fortune Wings Club

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Tianjin Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Tianjin Airlines: (click on the stars below)
